Returns: the type of data found in the incorrectly typed element
foundType().Description: Returns the type of data found in the incorrectly typed element. The returned string may, but is not required to, contain the value as well. The exact format of the string is unspecified.

Parameters: Method: the Method object for the annotation element
String: the (erroneous) type of data found in the annotation. This string may, but is not required to, contain the value as well. The exact format of the string is unspecified.
AnnotationTypeMismatchException(java.lan.Description: Constructs an AnnotationTypeMismatchException for the specified annotation type element and found data type.

Returns: the Method object for the incorrectly typed element
